comment: A class is nonempty if and only if it has at least one element. Proposition 5.17(1) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 20. This version of ~ n0 requires only that ` x ` not be free in, rather than not occur in, ` A ` . (Contributed by NM, 17-Oct-2003.)
